name: Earthquake simulation project
description:
Find a place to hide before everything is destroyed by an earthquake.

NOTES:

  • This is just a demo made for a school project.
  • The Demo is only in Romanian. If you really wanna try it the second button in the menu should take you to the first simulation.
  • The demo is made in Unity using C# by me, and the models are made by a classmate.
  • The project was made for learning purposes a long time ago. I release it now just for fun and to see later how much I've learned.
